overview: Randy Clark, Chief Marketing Officer, leads UC4â€™s products, programs and communications globally. Clark brings more than 15 years of growth leadership experience transforming business-to-business software companies to address growth markets through new products and go-to-market models, as well as deep expertise in systems management and cloud computing. He most recently served with Platform Computing as CMO instituting business and marketing strategies that enabled the company to transition from the niche high-performance computing market into growing enterprise analytics and cloud computing markets. Previously, Clark was Senior Vice President of Marketing for Parametric Technology Corporation (PTC), where he helped create the Product Lifecycle Management category and position PTC as category leader. Clark also served as Vice President of Marketing for multiple public and venture-backed companies, including Symyx, Clearforest and Enigma where he successfully led transformative growth. He holds a B.A. in economics from the University of Pennsylvania and a MBA from the Harvard Business School.
